i like nfl and college football.

participant_2.background:

grandma makes jewelry.
I'm a brunette who loves to organize and stand out in a crowd with my leather clothes.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing today?
Hi there, I am doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. What kind of things do you enjoy doing?
I enjoy reading, cooking, and spending time with my family.
Reading is a great way to relax. I love to cook too! What is your favorite meal to make?
I love making chicken parmesan. I also love to make chocolate chip cookies.
Oh, those both sound delicious! I love chicken parmesan too.
I have a dog and a cat. They are my best friends.
Aww, that sounds adorable. I used to have a dog, but he passed away a few years ago.
I'm so sorry to hear that. Dogs are such wonderful companions.
They are. I miss him every day.
I'm sure he misses you too.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day!
You too! Thanks for chatting with me
